data.title: The Demolished Man by Alfred Bester, hardcover,
data.text:
Description

c1953; The Rat Race, a merciless novel of the TV business by Bester, paperback, not in best condition in plastic bag; and a journal with three items glued in it as pictured along with a cut out article from the Los Angeles Times Sunday July 11, 1976 by Harlan Ellison titled "Best of Bester" stapled to a sheet of paper from Ted Bates new york / advertising.

Description

Ottsville Auction Items from Alfred & Rolly Bester Estates Online Auction - Bidding Now Open Closing May 14, 2024 starting at 6:30 PM Furniture -- Georgian Style Chest on Chest Highboy; George III Style Figured Mahogany Slant Front Desk; Georgian Style 4 drawer Bachelor Chest; Federal Mahogany Carved Sofa; Jacobean Trestle Style Flip Storage Top Work Stand / Side End Table; Pine Blind Door Corner Cupboard; Live Edge Plank top trestle table, 73" long; Oldtowne Cherry double gateleg extension table; Dropleaf table with tiger maple top; pine Welsh cupboard; folding military table; pine hutch table; antique cider press; rockers; chairs, tables & more. Hundreds of Books - Alfred Bester's Science Fiction novels in English & many foreign languages including Tiger Tiger; The Demolished Man; The Stars My Destination graphic novel signed & numbered; Computer Connection in braille, The Rat Race and many many others; and Rolly Bester scrapbook; Hundreds of Other Books -- 1795 Edition of Chambers Dictionary - Cyclopaedia; 1875 - The Works of Lord Macaulay 8 vols; Ten Years of Holiday 1956 including his article Inside TV; Easton Press Masterpieces of Science Fiction - 63 titles including Demolished Man; Charles Reade 12 volumes; Encyclopedia Britannica editions 11th & 14th editions; Rudyard Kipling 26 vols; Charles Dickens 34 vols; J.
